Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller

Class AssignSkillsController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller.AssignSkillsController
public class AssignSkillsController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling operations related to assigning skills to collaborators.

  • Method Details

    • assignSkills

      public Optional<Collaborator> assignSkills(String collaboratorIdNumber)
      Assigns skills to a collaborator.
      Parameters:
      collaboratorIdNumber - The identification number of the collaborator.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the updated collaborator if the assignment was successful, otherwise empty.

    • getCollaborators

      Retrieves the list of collaborators.
      Returns:

    • getSkills

      Retrieves the list of skills not assigned to the selected collaborator.
      Parameters:
      collaboratorIdNumber - the collaborator id number
      Returns:
      The list of skills not assigned to the selected collaborator.
